column6: 2015. she is survived by her husband
column10: yolanda lewis and jessie ray baker; mother
column12: shawn and jamala gray; two aunts
column13: evelyn smith jackson and wanza blair; uncle
column14: adrian rose; and a host of cousins and friends. april was a member of the azusa house of praise. funeral services will be held 11 a. m. wednesday
column16: 2015 at the central chapel of bennett funeral home
column17: 3215 cutshaw ave. interment will follow in oakwood cemetery. the family will receive friends one hour prior to the service.
